title: A.G.E. Advanced Eye
description: A.G.E. Advanced Eye is an Anti-Aging Eye Cream For Wrinkles & Dark Circles is an advanced skincare solution designed to combat multiple signs of aging around the delicate eye area. This silky-textured cream targets crow’s feet, puffiness, and dark circles using a potent blend of ingredients including ProxylaneTM, Matrixyl 3000, and optical diffusers.

title: A.G.E. Interrupter Advanced
description: A.G.E. Interrupter Advanced is a cutting-edge anti-aging cream designed to combat visible signs of aging caused by collagen decline and glycation. This potent formulation contains higher concentrations of key ingredients compared to its predecessor, including 18% Proxylane and a 4.25% Wild Fruit Flavonoid blend, along with the addition of 0.1% Glycyrrhetinic Acid.
ingredients: 1% Niacinamide AQUA / WATER ● HYDROXYPROPYL TETRAHYDROPYRANTRIOL ● GLYCERIN ● PROPYLENE GLYCOL ● STEARIC ACID ● BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER / SHEA BUTTER ● HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID ● PALMITIC ACID ● PENTYLENE GLYCOL ● OLEYL ALCOHOL ● ARACHIDYL ALCOHOL ● MYRISTYL MYRISTATE ● PANTHENOL ● NIACINAMIDE ● DIMETHICONE ● ISONONYL ISONONANOATE ● BIS-PEG/PPG-16/16 PEG/PPG-16/16 DIMETHICONE ● GLYCERYL STEARATE ● CANDELILLA CERA / CANDELILLA WAX ● BEHENYL ALCOHOL ● PEG-100 STEARATE ● SODIUM POLYACRYLATE ● PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAISOSTEARATE ● 4-T-BUTYLCYCLOHEXANOL ● ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE ● CAPRYLYL GLYCOL ● XANTHAN GUM ● CHLORPHENESIN ● MYRISTIC ACID ● CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE ● GLYCYRRHETINIC ACID ● PARFUM / FRAGRANCE ● SORBITOL ● VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT ● POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE ● ADENOSINE ● CITRIC ACID ● PUNICA GRANATUM FRUIT EXTRACT ● LIMONENE ● COUMARIN ● LINALOOL ● PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE

title: C E Ferulic
description: Key benefits include:1) Environmental Protection: Shields skin from free radical damage caused by UV rays, pollution, and other environmental aggressors2) Anti-Aging Effects: Improves the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness3) Skin Brightening: Enhances skin’s complexion, promoting a more radiant appearance4) Long-Lasting Efficacy: Once absorbed, the serum remains effective for a minimum of 72 hours5) Clinically Proven Results: Demonstrated to reduce combined oxidative damage from UVA/UVB rays, ozone pollution, and diesel exhaust by up to 41%

title: Cell Cycle Catalyst
description: Cell Cycle Catalyst is an advanced anti-aging serum designed to accelerate skin renewal and enhance overall skincare results. This potent formulation combines a 7.7% multi-acid complex (alpha and beta hydroxy acids) with 1% Taurine to deliver comprehensive skin benefits.
ingredients: 1% Taurine AQUA / WATER, GLYCERIN, GLYCOLIC ACID, ETHOXYDIGLYCOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHYTIC ACID, LACTIC ACID, MANDELIC ACID, TAURINE, SALICYLIC ACID, CHLORPHENESIN, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE

title: Clarifying Clay Masque
description: The Clarifying Clay Masque is a comprehensive skincare treatment designed to deeply cleanse and refine the skin for those struggling with excess oil and congested pores. Formulated with premium kaolin and bentonite clays, this advanced mask offers a multi-action approach to skin purification.
ingredients: 2% Mixed Fruit Extracts (Rich in Hydroxy Acids)

Aloe and Chamomile AQUA / WATER / EAU, KAOLIN, BENTONITE, ALOE BARBADENSIS / ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE,PROPYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ARGILLA / MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CETEARETH-20, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, XANTHAN GUM, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL / SUNFLOWER SEED OIL, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM EXTRACT / SUGAR CANE EXTRACT / EXTRAIT DE CANNE A SUCRE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FRUIT WATER / ORANGE FRUIT WATER, CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUIT EXTRACT, ACER SACCHARINUM EXTRACT / SUGAR MAPLE EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA EXTRACT / MATRICARIA FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF OIL / ROSEMARY LEAF OIL

title: Emollience
description: Key benefits include:1) Deep Hydration: Restores and maintains daily moisture, ensuring skin stays hydrated throughout the day2) Gentle Formula: Crafted with soothing ingredients, making it suitable for sensitive skin and post-procedure care3) Skin Barrier Support: Strengthens the skin’s natural moisture barrier, protecting against environmental stressors4) Lightweight Texture: Absorbs quickly and evenly without leaving a greasy residue, providing a comfortable feel on the skin5) Versatile Use: Ideal for daily application in various climates, especially beneficial in dry or cold conditions

title: Epidermal Repair
description: Key benefits include:1) Skin Barrier Restoration: Facilitates rapid repair of the skin’s natural protective barrier, helping to accelerate healing and reduce vulnerability2) Redness Reduction: Effectively diminishes the appearance of skin redness and inflammation, providing a calming effect on sensitive skin3) Post-Procedure Support: Ideal for use after dermatological treatments like chemical peels, laser resurfacing, and IPL, helping to soothe and rehabilitate skin4) Moisture Retention: Acts as a protective veil to retain moisture and support skin’s natural healing processes5) Gentle Formulation: Suitable for normal to dry skin types, with key ingredients like beta glucan, centella asiatica extract, and nymphea alba flower extract that work together to soothe and protect the skin

title: Equalizing Toner
description: Equalizing Toner is an advanced exfoliating toner designed to refresh, restore, and refine skin through a carefully crafted botanical and acid-based formula.
ingredients: Botanical Extracts AQUA / WATER / EAU ALOE BARBADENSIS / ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA WATER / WITCH HAZEL WATER ISOCETETH-20 PHENOXYETHANOL SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM EXTRACT / SUGAR CANE EXTRACT / EXTRAIT DE CANNE A SUCRE SODIUM HYDROXIDE PVP CHLORPHENESIN CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FRUIT WATER / ORANGE FRUIT WATER CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUIT EXTRACT DISODIUM EDTA GLYCERIN ACER SACCHARINUM EXTRACT / SUGAR MAPLE EXTRACT CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS OIL / ORANGE PEEL OIL LIMONENE PROPYLENE GLYCOL ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT / ROSEMARY LEAF EXTRACT CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA EXTRACT / MATRICARIA FLOWER EXTRACT THYMUS VULGARIS FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT – THYME FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT

title: Even Tone Correcting Serum 50ml
description: Key benefits include:1) Complexion Evenness: Helps reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and uneven skin tone for a more uniform complexion2) Daily Skin Improvement: Formulated for tolerable, consistent use, allowing for gradual and sustainable skin tone enhancement3) Lightweight Hydration: Provides moisture while correcting skin tone, ensuring the skin remains hydrated and comfortable throughout the day4) Targeted Correction: Addresses multiple skin discoloration issues, including age spots, dark spots, and general skin tone irregularities5) Advanced Skincare Technology: Utilizes a sophisticated formula that not only conceals but also works to improve skin health over time

title: Eye Balm
description: Key benefits include:1) Comprehensive Aging Defense: Targets three prime signs of aging – moisture loss, collagen breakdown, and free radical damage – with a synergistic blend of gentle, powerful plant-based ingredients2) Moisture Restoration: Replenishes lost moisture in the delicate eye area, helping to improve skin’s hydration and overall appearance3) Visible Aging Reduction: Minimizes the appearance of under-eye puffiness, crow’s feet, and fine lines while supporting skin firmness4) Skin Barrier Support: Helps replace lipids in dry skin, improving the appearance and resilience of the delicate eye area5) Gentle Formulation: Provides rich, corrective treatment with a soft, matte finish, suitable for dry and mature skin types

title: EyeMax AlphaRet Overnight Cream 15ml
description: Key benefits include:1) Advanced Anti-Aging Action: Utilizes patented AlphaRet technology, a unique combination of retinoid and alpha hydroxy acid, to effectively reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and signs of aging around the eyes2) Comprehensive Skin Improvement: Clinically proven to improve skin texture, darkness, and puffiness in as little as 4 weeks of nightly use3) Intense Hydration: Provides a rich, luxurious moisture complex that supports the skin barrier, leaving the eye area feeling softer, smoother, and firmer4) Environmental Protection: Incorporates antioxidants to defend against environmental stressors and prevent further skin damage5) Gentle Formulation: Specifically designed for the sensitive eye area, the cream is non-comedogenic and formulated without parabens, fragrances, and dyes

title: Face Cream
description: SkinCeuticals Face Cream is a specialized lightweight moisturizer designed to address aging and dryness in mature skin.
ingredients: Silymarin AQUA / WATER / EAU, DIMETHICONE, GLYCERIN, NYLON-12, STEARETH-21, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, ALCOHOL DENAT., BORON NITRIDE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYL, DIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL / SUNFLOWER SEED OIL, PHENOXYETHANOLVITIS VINIFERA SEED OIL / GRAPE SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROLBIS-PEG/PPG-20/20 DIMETHICONE, SESAMUM INDICUM OIL / SESAME SEED OIL, GLYCINE SOJA OIL / SOYBEAN OIL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOLPROPYLENE GLYCOLPOLYACRYLAMIDEDIMETHICONOLSODIUM BENZOATEC13-14 ISOPARAFFINDIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMERPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATESILYBUM MARIANUM EXTRACT

title: Gentle Cleanser
description: Key benefits include:1) Advanced Makeup Removal: Efficiently removes long-wear face and eye makeup without leaving residue, ensuring thorough cleansing2) Intense Hydration: Formulated with emollient-rich surfactants, allantoin, and glycerin to hydrate, soften, and condition the skin, preventing dryness and tightness3) Pre-Treatment Preparation: Ideal for use before professional skincare treatments, leaving skin soft, moisturized, and primed for cosmeceutical applications4) Gentle Skin Support: Non-foaming formula that cleanses without stripping natural oils, making it suitable for dry and sensitive skin types5) Skin Barrier Protection: Helps maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier while effectively removing impurities and makeup

title: HA Intensifier
description: Key benefits include:1) Hyaluronic Acid Amplification: Clinically proven to increase skin’s hyaluronic acid levels by 30%, enhancing overall hydration and plumpness2) Visible Anti-Aging Effects: Reduces the appearance of crow’s feet, nasolabial folds, and marionette lines, improving skin firmness and smoothness3) Multi-Dimensional Hydration: Utilizes a unique combination of pure hyaluronic acid, Proxylane, and botanical extracts to provide long-lasting hydration and improve skin texture4) Versatile Application: Suitable for all skin types and can be used as part of a post-dermal filler skincare regimen (with physician approval)5) Comprehensive Skin Improvement: In clinical studies, demonstrated significant improvements in skin plumpness, firmness, elasticity, and overall texture within 12 weeks of use

title: Hydrating B5 Gel
description: Key benefits include:1) Intense Hydration: Utilizes hyaluronic acid to attract and retain moisture, providing deep hydration without clogging pores, leaving skin supple and smooth2) Skin Barrier Support: Combines vitamin B5 to strengthen the skin’s natural barrier, protecting against environmental stressors and reducing moisture loss3) Versatile Skin Treatment: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, dehydrated, and acne-prone skin, enhancing the effectiveness of daily moisturizers4) Anti-Aging Properties: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by improving skin hydration and elasticity5) Lightweight Restoration: Replenishes essential nutrients, restoring skin’s radiance and promoting a smoother, more youthful complexion

title: Hydrating B5 Masque
description: SkinCeuticals Hydrating B5 Masque is an intensely hydrating gel mask designed to replenish moisture levels and restore skin balance.

title: LHA Cleansing Gel
description: LHA Cleansing Gel is a targeted exfoliating LHA/AHA/BHA cleanser featuring a conditioning surfactant and a 12% concentration of key ingredients combining lipo-hydroxy acid, glycolic acid, salicylic acid, glycerin, and sorbitol to remove excess oils and makeup, while decongesting pores and brightening skin. Formulated for aging skin prone to breakouts, this deep cleansing gel gently refines the appearance of congested pores and helps minimize blemishes without drying the skin.

title: LHA Serum
description: LHA Serum is an innovative, oil-free face serum designed to address both aging concerns and acne-prone skin. This multi-functional product offers a unique combination of acids to target multiple skin issues simultaneously.

ingredients: 1% Taurine AQUA / WATER, GLYCERIN, GLYCOLIC ACID, ETHOXYDIGLYCOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PHYTIC ACID, LACTIC ACID, MANDELIC ACID, TAURINE, SALICYLIC ACID, CHLORPHENESIN, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE

title: Clarifying Clay Masque
description: The Clarifying Clay Masque is a comprehensive skincare treatment designed to deeply cleanse and refine the skin for those struggling with excess oil and congested pores. Formulated with premium kaolin and bentonite clays, this advanced mask offers a multi-action approach to skin purification.
ingredients: 2% Mixed Fruit Extracts (Rich in Hydroxy Acids)

Aloe and Chamomile AQUA / WATER / EAU, KAOLIN, BENTONITE, ALOE BARBADENSIS / ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE,PROPYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ARGILLA / MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CETEARETH-20, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, XANTHAN GUM, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL / SUNFLOWER SEED OIL, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM EXTRACT / SUGAR CANE EXTRACT / EXTRAIT DE CANNE A SUCRE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FRUIT WATER / ORANGE FRUIT WATER, CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUIT EXTRACT, ACER SACCHARINUM EXTRACT / SUGAR MAPLE EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA EXTRACT / MATRICARIA FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF OIL / ROSEMARY LEAF OIL

title: Emollience
description: Key benefits include:1) Deep Hydration: Restores and maintains daily moisture, ensuring skin stays hydrated throughout the day2) Gentle Formula: Crafted with soothing ingredients, making it suitable for sensitive skin and post-procedure care3) Skin Barrier Support: Strengthens the skin’s natural moisture barrier, protecting against environmental stressors4) Lightweight Texture: Absorbs quickly and evenly without leaving a greasy residue, providing a comfortable feel on the skin5) Versatile Use: Ideal for daily application in various climates, especially beneficial in dry or cold conditions

title: Epidermal Repair
description: Key benefits include:1) Skin Barrier Restoration: Facilitates rapid repair of the skin’s natural protective barrier, helping to accelerate healing and reduce vulnerability2) Redness Reduction: Effectively diminishes the appearance of skin redness and inflammation, providing a calming effect on sensitive skin3) Post-Procedure Support: Ideal for use after dermatological treatments like chemical peels, laser resurfacing, and IPL, helping to soothe and rehabilitate skin4) Moisture Retention: Acts as a protective veil to retain moisture and support skin’s natural healing processes5) Gentle Formulation: Suitable for normal to dry skin types, with key ingredients like beta glucan, centella asiatica extract, and nymphea alba flower extract that work together to soothe and protect the skin

title: Equalizing Toner
description: Equalizing Toner is an advanced exfoliating toner designed to refresh, restore, and refine skin through a carefully crafted botanical and acid-based formula.
ingredients: Botanical Extracts AQUA / WATER / EAU ALOE BARBADENSIS / ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA WATER / WITCH HAZEL WATER ISOCETETH-20 PHENOXYETHANOL SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM EXTRACT / SUGAR CANE EXTRACT / EXTRAIT DE CANNE A SUCRE SODIUM HYDROXIDE PVP CHLORPHENESIN CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS FRUIT WATER / ORANGE FRUIT WATER CITRUS LIMON FRUIT EXTRACT / LEMON FRUIT EXTRACT DISODIUM EDTA GLYCERIN ACER SACCHARINUM EXTRACT / SUGAR MAPLE EXTRACT CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS OIL / ORANGE PEEL OIL LIMONENE PROPYLENE GLYCOL ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT / ROSEMARY LEAF EXTRACT CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA EXTRACT / MATRICARIA FLOWER EXTRACT THYMUS VULGARIS FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT – THYME FLOWER/LEAF EXTRACT

title: Even Tone Correcting Serum 50ml
description: Key benefits include:1) Complexion Evenness: Helps reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and uneven skin tone for a more uniform complexion2) Daily Skin Improvement: Formulated for tolerable, consistent use, allowing for gradual and sustainable skin tone enhancement3) Lightweight Hydration: Provides moisture while correcting skin tone, ensuring the skin remains hydrated and comfortable throughout the day4) Targeted Correction: Addresses multiple skin discoloration issues, including age spots, dark spots, and general skin tone irregularities5) Advanced Skincare Technology: Utilizes a sophisticated formula that not only conceals but also works to improve skin health over time

title: Eye Balm
description: Key benefits include:1) Comprehensive Aging Defense: Targets three prime signs of aging – moisture loss, collagen breakdown, and free radical damage – with a synergistic blend of gentle, powerful plant-based ingredients2) Moisture Restoration: Replenishes lost moisture in the delicate eye area, helping to improve skin’s hydration and overall appearance3) Visible Aging Reduction: Minimizes the appearance of under-eye puffiness, crow’s feet, and fine lines while supporting skin firmness4) Skin Barrier Support: Helps replace lipids in dry skin, improving the appearance and resilience of the delicate eye area5) Gentle Formulation: Provides rich, corrective treatment with a soft, matte finish, suitable for dry and mature skin types

title: EyeMax AlphaRet Overnight Cream 15ml
description: Key benefits include:1) Advanced Anti-Aging Action: Utilizes patented AlphaRet technology, a unique combination of retinoid and alpha hydroxy acid, to effectively reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and signs of aging around the eyes2) Comprehensive Skin Improvement: Clinically proven to improve skin texture, darkness, and puffiness in as little as 4 weeks of nightly use3) Intense Hydration: Provides a rich, luxurious moisture complex that supports the skin barrier, leaving the eye area feeling softer, smoother, and firmer4) Environmental Protection: Incorporates antioxidants to defend against environmental stressors and prevent further skin damage5) Gentle Formulation: Specifically designed for the sensitive eye area, the cream is non-comedogenic and formulated without parabens, fragrances, and dyes

title: Face Cream
description: SkinCeuticals Face Cream is a specialized lightweight moisturizer designed to address aging and dryness in mature skin.
ingredients: Silymarin AQUA / WATER / EAU, DIMETHICONE, GLYCERIN, NYLON-12, STEARETH-21, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, ALCOHOL DENAT., BORON NITRIDE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYL, DIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL / SUNFLOWER SEED OIL, PHENOXYETHANOLVITIS VINIFERA SEED OIL / GRAPE SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROLBIS-PEG/PPG-20/20 DIMETHICONE, SESAMUM INDICUM OIL / SESAME SEED OIL, GLYCINE SOJA OIL / SOYBEAN OIL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOLPROPYLENE GLYCOLPOLYACRYLAMIDEDIMETHICONOLSODIUM BENZOATEC13-14 ISOPARAFFINDIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMERPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATESILYBUM MARIANUM EXTRACT

title: Gentle Cleanser
description: Key benefits include:1) Advanced Makeup Removal: Efficiently removes long-wear face and eye makeup without leaving residue, ensuring thorough cleansing2) Intense Hydration: Formulated with emollient-rich surfactants, allantoin, and glycerin to hydrate, soften, and condition the skin, preventing dryness and tightness3) Pre-Treatment Preparation: Ideal for use before professional skincare treatments, leaving skin soft, moisturized, and primed for cosmeceutical applications4) Gentle Skin Support: Non-foaming formula that cleanses without stripping natural oils, making it suitable for dry and sensitive skin types5) Skin Barrier Protection: Helps maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier while effectively removing impurities and makeup

title: HA Intensifier
description: Key benefits include:1) Hyaluronic Acid Amplification: Clinically proven to increase skin’s hyaluronic acid levels by 30%, enhancing overall hydration and plumpness2) Visible Anti-Aging Effects: Reduces the appearance of crow’s feet, nasolabial folds, and marionette lines, improving skin firmness and smoothness3) Multi-Dimensional Hydration: Utilizes a unique combination of pure hyaluronic acid, Proxylane, and botanical extracts to provide long-lasting hydration and improve skin texture4) Versatile Application: Suitable for all skin types and can be used as part of a post-dermal filler skincare regimen (with physician approval)5) Comprehensive Skin Improvement: In clinical studies, demonstrated significant improvements in skin plumpness, firmness, elasticity, and overall texture within 12 weeks of use

title: Hydrating B5 Gel
description: Key benefits include:1) Intense Hydration: Utilizes hyaluronic acid to attract and retain moisture, providing deep hydration without clogging pores, leaving skin supple and smooth2) Skin Barrier Support: Combines vitamin B5 to strengthen the skin’s natural barrier, protecting against environmental stressors and reducing moisture loss3) Versatile Skin Treatment: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, dehydrated, and acne-prone skin, enhancing the effectiveness of daily moisturizers4) Anti-Aging Properties: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by improving skin hydration and elasticity5) Lightweight Restoration: Replenishes essential nutrients, restoring skin’s radiance and promoting a smoother, more youthful complexion

title: Hydrating B5 Masque
description: SkinCeuticals Hydrating B5 Masque is an intensely hydrating gel mask designed to replenish moisture levels and restore skin balance.

title: LHA Cleansing Gel
description: LHA Cleansing Gel is a targeted exfoliating LHA/AHA/BHA cleanser featuring a conditioning surfactant and a 12% concentration of key ingredients combining lipo-hydroxy acid, glycolic acid, salicylic acid, glycerin, and sorbitol to remove excess oils and makeup, while decongesting pores and brightening skin. Formulated for aging skin prone to breakouts, this deep cleansing gel gently refines the appearance of congested pores and helps minimize blemishes without drying the skin.

title: LHA Serum
description: LHA Serum is an innovative, oil-free face serum designed to address both aging concerns and acne-prone skin. This multi-functional product offers a unique combination of acids to target multiple skin issues simultaneously.
